description: Fired approximately every 1-15 seconds for each token if its price has changed.
sql_insert: INSERT INTO price_token_events (token, price_usd, timestamp) SELECT elem->>'token', (elem->>'price_usd')::numeric, to_timestamp((elem->>'timestamp_nanosec')::numeric / 1000000000) at time zone 'UTC' FROM jsonb_array_elements($1::jsonb) AS elem

endpoints.query: SELECT jsonb_build_object('price_usd', price_usd::float8, 'timestamp_nanosec', ((extract(epoch from timestamp) * 1000000000)::bigint)::text) FROM price_token_events WHERE token = ($1->>'token') ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1

WITH requested_time AS (SELECT to_timestamp(($1->>'timestamp_nanosec')::numeric / 1000000000) at time zone 'UTC' as ts) SELECT jsonb_build_object('price_usd', price_usd::float8, 'timestamp_nanosec', ((extract(epoch from timestamp) * 1000000000)::bigint)::text) FROM price_token_events, requested_time WHERE token = ($1->>'token') AND timestamp <= requested_time.ts ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1
